sections.text: This November day started quietly, with my weekly visit to the doctor. However, on my way home, I had a revelation: today is not a day like the others, I have the feeling that it is an important date! But I can't remember why... Come with me on this day, maybe it will come back.

sections.title: What is it ?
sections.text: Le souvenir perdu is a digital escape game in which your helping Madeleine in her daily life, by discovering 8 jobs in the health and social sector.

sections.title: Context
sections.text: This project was commissioned by the Normandy region to the agency Lost Mechanics. I was in charge of the integration and front-end development of this project as a freelancer.

sections.title: Tech
sections.text: This project was made using Vue with Nuxt. It is the first in a series of other digital escape games on various other work areas. As such, I had to think of each puzzle as reusable components adapting to a wide range of scenarios.
